name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: if [ -f pyproject.toml ]; then curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 - && ln -s /root/.local/bin/poetry /usr/local/bin/poetry && poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true && poetry install --no-root && ls -lash && source .venv/bin/activate && echo 'âœ… Dependencies installed'; else echo 'No pyproject.toml found'; fi
